scripts.ci: npm run test && npm run format:check && npm run lint
scripts.format: npm run format:purty && npm run format:prettier
scripts.format:purty: find src test -name "*.purs" | xargs -n1 purty format --write
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:purty && npm run format:check:prettier
scripts.format:check:purty: find src test -name "*.purs" | xargs -n1 purty validate
